name: domain-locker
description: Domain Locker is a self-hosted dashboard and monitoring tool for domain names. It tracks expiry dates, DNS configuration, SSL status, and registrar details, helping operators avoid lapses and keep domain information organized.
features: Expiry tracking: Monitor domain expiration dates with alerts to prevent accidental lapses and loss of ownership.
DNS monitoring: Check DNS configuration and nameserver settings to ensure proper domain resolution.
SSL certificate status: Track certificate expiration and validity for domains to maintain secure connections.
Registrar information: Store and view registrar details, account credentials, and transfer codes in one place.
WHOIS lookup: Perform automated WHOIS queries to verify registration details and detect unauthorized changes.
Multi-domain dashboard: Manage portfolios of domains with sortable lists and filtering by status or expiration date.
Notification system: Receive email or webhook alerts when domains approach expiration or configuration changes occur.
Privacy protection: Keep sensitive domain information on your own server without sharing with third-party services.
